entry.tran: (供一个人吃的)一份食物的量
entry.def: A serving is an amount of food that is given to one person at a meal.

example.ex: Quantities will vary according to how many servings of soup you want to prepare...

entry.def: A serving spoon or dish is used for giving out food at a meal.

example.ex: Pile the potatoes into a warm serving dish.
example.tran: 将土豆堆在一个保温菜盘里。

means.word_mean: 1. an individual quantity of food or drink taken as part of a meal;
2. the act of delivering a writ or summons upon someone;
